level.heading: Defective grants recorded on or after April 27, 1994.
level.text: Any instrument recorded in the Office of the Recorder of Deeds on or after April 27, 1994, shall be effective notwithstanding the existence of 1 or more of the failures in the formal requisites listed in § 42-404, unless the failure is challenged in a judicial proceeding commenced within 6 months after the instrument is recorded.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-110, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-402.
